dogecoin.text:
I sold some of my $DOGE way before SNL, and bought back all and more at less than I sold during SNL.

@AskRobinhood app filled my limit order 20-30 minutes later when the price falled even more, but at full price!

Not the actual market price!

I’m done with Robinhood.

I placed order to buy $DOGE on @RobinhoodApp at a price way above .49 and the order has yet to fill.

Price is at .49 and my order is not filing. 

I think price is going to spike up again soon fast. 

#DOGE
#Dogefather 
#DogeSNL

I’d dump all my $DOGE right now and make a good profit still — but I don’t believe @elonmusk @mcuban would tie their brand and reputation to a pump and dump Ponzi scheme.

I believe they have a bigger vision for #DOGE than they’ve shared.

If it flops millions wouldn’t forget.

@BoPolny I do not yet know how to process everything you have shared, but the fact you have not promoted $DOGE on your website (at least that I ever have seen) I am more inclined to find confidence in your predictions. 

I only dabbled in Cryptos, but I thought @elonmusk was honest.

As it stands I made a little on $DOGE to cover all the losses I took on other Crypto’s selling today.

Once it’s clear the swamp isn’t interfering with Crypto prices — I’ll buy back in.

I don’t trust $USD, but sadly it buys more Crypto’s when they all fall than holding Crypto.

Sold most my $DOGE / kept some from house proceeds. 

I like $DOGE, but I don’t trust Government or Musk now.

Gov isn’t going to stay out of free markets to let us choose our own currency.

Until no one wants $USD for any Crypto - they are all at the mercy of those who make it.

@indepndnt_thnkr @CervoGabriel @AcesShred @StealthEX_io @Shibtoken @army_shiba @ShibaInuSwap @elonmusk I only dabbled in Cryptos. 

I sold off all my junk coins and put it in real technology coins -- even if the currency value falls, the tech value remains.

$NEO $UBT $THETA $VET

I have fairy dust amounts of $DOGE $SHIB and $SAFEMOON 

Most of my investment is in $PSLV (EFT).

@indepndnt_thnkr @CervoGabriel @AcesShred @StealthEX_io @Shibtoken @army_shiba @ShibaInuSwap @elonmusk Full disclosure I kept $100 in DOGE, but sold 95% of it at .40 (I held at .70 and I bought more on the fall after SNL because I TRUSTED @elonmusk) but after he SAT SILENT yesterday as $DOGE fell from .45 to under .40 FOR HOURS -- not someone I will ever trust again.

But, that super cool party and really awesome dream of $DOGE as the people's currency -- really sad and really hard to see how as long as it stays tied to Musk it has any future.

People have lost trust and confidence in the coin.

I'm not mad or angry at Musk, but I am sad.

Yes, there is still a chance $DOGE can go up, and I am holding some still. 

I may cash it in when it goes up, or hold it for a few years, to see what comes of it.

The best hope for $DOGE is fire Musk as the mascot and get a new one. 

The dog and memes are not the Mascot.

But not anymore.

The idea that he and Tesla bought a billion in $BTC, selling it appears most of it before his tweet that kicked $BTC (and the entire crypto market) in the balls was a big FU to the entire market.

His tweet 5-6 hours after $DOGE fell to .40 - was another WTF.

I did not lose any money on $DOGE, I bought way more under .40 than anything. Thankfully I got out with a little profit, but I would have held $DOGE and had no problem with the up and down and the drops from traders crashing the price.

None of that mattered.

Elon had our back.

Most people would be pumping what they still hold, but it is hard to see how $DOGE has any long term future now after what Musk did.

This is a personality coin and that was the confidence people had it in -- only to watch Musk do jack squat for hours as the price fell.

Yes, I do imagine he will keep pumping $DOGE as the backlash over his wreckless $BTC tweet and leaving his loyal $DOGE supporters hanging for 6-7 hours in an attempt to redeem his actions and restore his reputation.

I do still hold some $DOGE, but I sold most of it at .40.

That Ad above by the way is real, you can see it at:

https://t.co/rjoDmBqtMP

ARCHIVE: https://t.co/ioYMe9mD7x

A dealership ran the promo. 

Not even Musk/Tesla ran the offer. 

What does that say about how much he linked $DOGE?

I held $DOGE at .70 and bought more as it fell after Musk's SNL skit that sent the price falling and I held after his $BTC tweet still thinking having pumped the coin for months he had our back.

But, no he sat silent as the price the next morning fell.

Left us hanging.

If Tesla does come out to say they will take $DOGE it would likely be something like this "thanks but no thanks" gesture:

*25% fee on $DOGE. Suggested you sell it to USD (ie they think it is going to crash in value?) and only up to $5,000? If you pay $USD $5,000 cash discount? https://t.co/qSg4QjUIsw

The $DOGE coin got put down by @elonmusk because he left his most loyal base sitting for 6 or 7 hours as the price plummeted. 

He could have tweeted his bump tweets at .45 on the way to .40, but he sat silent for 6 or 7 hours.

Sadly, left abandoned people sold who had held.
